Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]Yeesh! This looks complicated, but I think I recognize the pattern.

Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]We need to set the variables for each switch according to the rules on the door here.

Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]Looks like the first one is already correct.  I have some data on True/False variables, so poke me when you're ready and I'll pull it up.

Name: [color=red]M.O.M.
Text: [color=black]I'll hang out in the corner here until then. Good luck!
